Posts.Content: I am so sorry you have had this worry. How have things gone :)
Posts.Title: Bad report after finishing my treatments.

Posts.Content: After 12 months I too have had enough. I am tired of feeling tired, fatigued, weak, tired from sleep interrupted by bone pain and also depression. Am researching natural alternatives though. It's a scary decision but i just want a life that I can feel joy again.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Yeeeeeees. Me too. Just struggling ti function even after 12 months. Seeing the Oncologist on Friday :)
Posts.Title: Arimedex and side effects

Posts.Content: I so hope there are responses to this. I am on Arimadex and desperately want to go off it but a bit worried. Side effects are just too hard.
Posts.Title: Natural alternatives to Als meds

Posts.Content: I am seeing a nutritionist/naturopath on Thursday so hopefully will have some answers. I already take couple if those. Good luck to us:) here's hoping upon hope it does the job:)
